title: What's eating Gilbert Grape?
creator_credit: Matalon Teper Ohlsson Production, J and M Entertainment, Meir Teper, Bertil Ohlsson, David Matalon and Lasse Hallstrom
brief_description: From the acclaimed director of “My life as a dog”, “What’s eating Gilbert Grape?” is a moving and at times comic portrayal of an unusual family in a small town. Gilbert (Johnny Depp) must keep a vigilant eye on his family, particularly his intellectually disabled younger brother Arnie (Leonardo Di Caprio) and his reclusive mother. When a stranger (Juliette Lewis) comes to town, she not only captures his heart, but also turns his life around.
